name: Tiss
description:
Tiss

Tiss is a top-down survival/horde game. Build your base and defend against waves of zombies in an ever-changing maze.

Version 1.0 - Iteration 2 (MVP)

Known Issues
  • There is no sound. This is definitely not because I'm too lazy to get into sound design, but is rather meant to spread awareness for deaf people or something.
  • The interact-button (F) doesn't close the opened Shop/Generator/Turret/Miner if you're standing too far away.
  • Zombies can't navigate properly sometimes. Uuuuuh let's say it's a feature
  • Healthbars will sometimes refuse to disappear
